name: places/ChIJJbTxWfpYwokR3ylmEcqli6s
adrFormatAddress: 711 5th Ave, New York, NY 10022, USA

editorialSummary.text: Boutique of Swiss luxury brand for watches, plus sunglasses, leather goods & accessories.

originalText.text:
As an avid Omega collector / fan, I always love coming here. The staff treat you right, prices are exactly what Omega is asking, and they can bring any watch to you from any location.

I bought a leather strap here for my 1954 Seamaster 600, absolutely love it. Makes my watch standout 1000x more.

originalText.text: I bought an Omega Speedmaster Moonwatch Professional back in May at this store. I donâ€™t have to go into detail about the Omega Speedmaster Moonwatch Professional since its reputation and history is well known and admired in the horological community. I was helped by Erick Dabandan and he provided an excellent service with his in-depth knowledge and welcoming personality. The overall shopping experience was great, and I am looking forward to my next purchase.

originalText.text:
This boutique is where I bought my first ever luxury watch. Truly an experience I will never forget. I went in here very indecisive about what I wanted, but thanks to the help of Erick Dabandan, we landed on a watch that is absolutely perfect to make my first. Erick and the rest of the staff treated me with the highest respect even though I had went after work and I was wearing sweats and a hoodie! I really appreciated how Erick didnâ€™t treat me like any other customer just trying to make a sale. He really cared about me making the right choice for my first watch. I was ultimately between the Seamaster 300M and the speedmaster in Sapphire. I was at the store with him for well over an hour and it only felt like 15 minutes. Just talking watches! I ultimately landed on the speedmaster and couldnâ€™t be happier. I appreciated all the knowledge Erick had to offer, I could talk to him about watches all day, in fact I still do!
I went back to Erick and bought myself the NTTD seamaster 300M. Because as we say, buying watches never ends with just one. :)
To this day I consider Erick much more than just a salesman at Omega but a friend.

Let me try this review again.
I am a female customer. Heads up before you call me Mr. Again lol.

I had a great experience at this boutique. Rach was amazing. I saw my watch in the window- thatâ€™s what drew me in. Rach helped seal the deal. He was very kind and real. Also patient. Very nice boutique. I ended up treating myself to this watch for a big birthday treat. I am looking forward to my next visit and purchase. Rach is my contact, for sure.

originalText.text: I have purchased 2 seamasters and both times had a very amazing experience sales associate Alexander Rubio was very professional. They are quick to attend to you maintenance wise as well
